item.description:
Price: $40.00 per person/4 weeks of golf (no refunds)

How to find us: Meetup outside the Club House

What: Golf League - 4 Wednesdays

When: Wednesday, May 9, 2012 @ 6:00 PM

Cost: $40 every 4 weeks of participation - unbelievable price!!

Where:

Rockland Golf Course
276 Plain Street
Rockland, MA 02370
781-878-5836

Who: No Guests for this meet-up as demand is high and space is limited


Hello Everyone -

In addition to Golf Lessons being offered this year, I wanted to also begin our first weekly South Shore Fitness Golf League!  Come join us, it'll be fun!! 

Please be mindful that when you RSVP, you are committing to an initial 4 weeks of play or $40's with a new RSVP's sent every 4 weeks throughout the summer.

I'll put together groups of 4 to T off each week.  The course is a beginner par 3 course, nice for honing your golfing skills.

PAYMENT:

In order to be included you must commit to the 4 weeks.  There are NO refunds and payment is expected the night of the 1st T time or May 9th.

NOTE:

  • If you RSVP, you are committing to the entire 4 weeks or $40's
  • If you have an absence, unfortunately, I cannot refund for the week missed
  • Plan to arrive a few minutes early to get organized and into groups
  • Golf clubs can be provided by the course at a minimal charge (I believe $8-$10's)
  • SSFMG and its organizers are not responsible for any injuries to participants or damage to equipment.


Organizers: Susan (AO)

The Final Deadline is Noon, Tuesday, May 1st for RSVP.  Please be mindful if you change your RSVP to NO at the last minute as you may be taking a spot away from someone else that is serious about participating.

Weather Alternative:

None.  This event will be canceled if it is raining or too foggy. I will send an email to cancel that afternoon or the night before. So check your email if the weather seems questionable. However, we cannot control Mother Nature so we will do our best to notify everyone at least 3 hours prior to the event. Please do not assume a cancellation unless you recieve an email saying so.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Directions:

group.name: The South Shore Fitness Meetup Group

item.name: 2012 Golf League
